name: rbsyl
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: anmp(wo(wn(wo(w0, w2)), wo(w0, w1)), wo(wn(w2), w1))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w2)), wo(w0, w1))
-| wo(wn(w2), w1)
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w1)), wo(wn(wo(w0, w2)), wo(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(w0, w1)
-| wo(w0, w2)
-| wo(wn(w2), w1)
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w1)), wo(wn(wo(w0, w2)), wo(w0, w1)))

body.origin: |- wo(wn(wo(wn(w2), w1)), wo(wn(wo(w0, w2)), wo(w0, w1)))

comment: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
